poem:
Title: "In the Cradle of Ice and Courage"

Voyager, Noosfera, welcomed by Antarctic frost,
While homeland under the Goth cloud, is lost.
Five bullets – a strange baptism for a scholar of plankton,
Echoing the universe from microscopic electron.
He, carrying the double lives of quiet resilience,
Trading warships for whales, peace for defiance.
Now traces of Ukraine linger in the Southern waves,
In the quest of science, in the pulse of the brave.
